SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_id, credit_card_format_id, billing_date, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, company_credit_card_id FROM elp_company_credit_card WHERE company_credit_card_id = :company_credit_card_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_CREDIT_CARD_FORMAT: SELECT company_id, credit_card_format_id, billing_date, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, company_credit_card_id FROM elp_company_credit_card WHERE credit_card_format_id = :credit_card_format_id and company_id = :company_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select CCC.company_credit_card_id, CCC.company_id, CO.code as company_code, CCC.credit_card_format_id, I.Code, T.translation as Credit_Card_Type, CCC.Billing_Date from ELITA.elp_company_credit_card CCC, ELITA.elp_credit_card_format CCF, ELITA.ELP_Company CO, ELITA.elp_list_item I, ELITA.elp_dict_item_translation T, ELITA.elp_language L WHERE CCC.credit_card_format_id = CCF.credit_card_format_id and CCC.company_id = CO.company_id and CCF.credit_card_type_id = I.list_item_id and I.dict_item_id = T.dict_item_id and T.language_id = L.language_id and L.language_id = :language_id --dynamic_in_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_company_credit_card SET company_id = :company_id, credit_card_format_id = :credit_card_format_id, billing_date = :billing_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE company_credit_card_id = :company_credit_card_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_company_credit_card ( company_id, credit_card_format_id, billing_date, created_by, company_credit_card_id ) VALUES ( :company_id, :credit_card_format_id, :billing_date, :created_by, :company_credit_card_id )
